name: Modules.Nfc.TagTechnologyIsoDep
summary: Provides access to ISO-DEP (ISO 14443-4) properties and I/O operations on a Modules.Nfc.NfcTag.

methods.name: getHiLayerResponse
methods.summary: Return the higher layer response bytes for NfcB tags.

returns.summary: ISO-DEP historical bytes, or null if this is not a NfcB tag.

methods.name: getHistoricalBytes
methods.summary: Return the ISO-DEP historical bytes for NfcA tags.

returns.summary: ISO-DEP historical bytes, or null if this is not a NfcA tag.

methods.name: getMaxTransceiveLength
methods.summary: Return the maximum number of bytes that can be sent with transceive.

methods.name: getTimeout
methods.summary: Get the current timeout for transceive in milliseconds.

methods.name: isExtendedLengthApduSupported
methods.summary: Whether the NFC adapter on this device supports extended length APDUs.

methods.name: transceive
methods.summary: Send raw ISO-DEP data to the tag and receive the response.
